section.p:
Thin wailing ghosts rise with the ground mist at dusk. The spirits of miserly bandits, they are not interested in you so much as in any gold or silver you might be carrying. You must
make a SANCTITY roll at a Difficulty of 17
to drive the ghosts off.
If you fail, they sweep into your backpack and devour all your money and any
silver nuggets
you are carrying.
